unnormalised: Airtel mhuntlear thoda shak yetalo asa ṁhaka, sāngta. Bengaluru-antlea eka iṣṭṭakḍean aikolam mhunn tānchea data chi speed peak hours-antlea 2 Mbps meren denvolia. Distā mhunn, zaitea lokak hācho tras zāta, Twitter-antle users buffering videos ani slow webpage loading-acher ulaitalle.
normalised: Airtel mhunnlear kiteak tori shanka yetaa asa mhaka, khorem sangtaam. Bangalore-ant-lo ek ixtt sangtaa tanche data speeds don megabits prati second-ak denvleat peak hours-chea vellar. Dispak lagtaa, zaitea lokank hem zaataa asa, Twitter-acher users buffering videos ani slow webpage loading-achi takraar kortat.

unnormalised: Disata mhunn "5G ready" mhuntlear atam ek marketing gimmick asa. Mhuzo cousin, zo Gurgaon-ant call center-ant kām kortā, mhonto ki tankā zaitea complaints yetale dropped calls ani poor network coverage-avixim, khās korun monsoon vellar. Ani online gaming-ak ping times 200ms-ak yetat - vaporuchak yogya nhoi!
normalised: Dispak lagtaa hem "five G ready" mhunnche mhunnlear ek marketing gimmick asa atam. Mhozo bhav, zo Gurgaon-ant-lea call center-ant kaam kortaa, tannem sanglam tankam zaiteo takraari yetat dropped calls ani poor network coverage-visheen, khas korun monsoons-chea vellar. Ani, online gaming-chea ping times don-she milliseconds-ak yetat - vaprunk zainam!

unnormalised: Hem zāta kī zaitea lokanchi sankhya vāḍlea kī tānchea ₹99 recharge plan-a udexim? Vo te throttling kortat data speed lokāk zor dhaklovnk adhik mahāg aslī योजना घेवपाक? Mhaka khobor na, punn distā mhunn chukichem asa. Umed asa TRAI hācher dhyān ditolo sogle Jio-ak switch korcheā pelyām.
normalised: Hem kiteak zata tech rupya ninety nine recharge plan zalea uprant users-anchi sankhya vaddleli asa mhunnun? vo te speeds kami kortaat lokank zaite duddu diun plan gheunk lagouncheak? Mhaka mahit na, punn hem borek disona mhaka. T-R-A-I-n hen vishayacher lok Jio-ak votaat adim dhyan diunk zai mhunn disataa.

unnormalised: Zaun asa hem thode vella purtem network congestion vo kī maintenance chi kām asa. Punn jar hem urtā, Airtel chi reputation khub kharab zateli. #AirtelDown #InternetProblems #India #5G #TRAI
normalised: Zait hem temporary network congestion vo maintenance kitem tori asunk yetaa. Punn tem chalu ravtaar, Airtel-ichi izzat bhayanok kami zatelee. hash Airtel Down hash Internet Problems hash India hash five G hash T-R-A-I
